articles.content: Top Indian shuttlers PV Sindhu, Lakshya Sen and HS Prannoy will be in action on Day 5 of the Paris Olympics in the singles events. Two-time Olympic medalist Sindhu, who started her campaign with a do… [+2341 chars]

articles.title: July 21, 2024 was the hottest day on Earth. The record was broken on July 22 - India Today
articles.description: These unprecedented temperatures are part of a long-term warming trend driven by human activities primarily the emission of greenhouse gases
articles.content:
On July 22, 2024, Earth experienced its hottest day on record, with the global average temperature reaching a staggering 17.15°C, according to NASA's analysis of global daily temperature data.
